Much more harder than CSGO. Map is super open and most walls are penetrable. Recoil control is just intense compared to CSGO & it feels more satisfying after killing someone in CS1.6 than in CSGO. This game (& CSS) is also my childhood & I'll always get the nostalgia when playing old CS. Community maps that are modded is definitely more creative & funny.
